title.bibl: Novi Svijet, June 23, 1927. [Jugoslav Student Receives Doctor's Degree from Chicago]

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Novi Svijet, June 23, 1927. [JUGOSLAV STUDENT RECEIVES DOCTOR'S DEGREE FROM CHICAGO]

body.p: The University of Chicago has conferred a Ph. D. degree on Frank Preveden, a native of Jugoslavia, who did his work in comparative philology. Since this was the second Ph. D. degree conferred on a Jugoslav by an American university, the Jugoslavs of Chicago were filled with a great deal of pride.
